newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS - Qantas sees Islands sale by June 97.
newsitem.headline: RTRS - Qantas sees Islands sale by June 97.

text.p: Qantas Airways Ltd chairman Gary Pemberton said he expected the airline to complete the sale of its string of Queensland holiday islands as the group has received a lot of interested in the resorts.
"We have received a lot of expressions of interest and I would expect it would be concluded by then (June 1997)," Pemberton told reporters after the release of 1995/96 results.
Qantas, 25 percent owned by British Airways Plc, earlier reported a 36.7 percent rise in net profit before abnormals to A$246.2 million for 1996/97.
